name: Melon Journey Pocket [GB]
description:
Your journey begins one day when you and your friend decide to take a trip to Melon Forest You spend your time happily fishing and harvesting wild radishes, thinking fondly of the delicious dinner the two of you will soon have.

Just as your friend heads into the forest on a search for firewood, a vicious storm rolls in. After being separated, you spend the night alone, determined to find them in the morning.

You roam around, asking the citizens of Hog Town if they’ve seen your friend and unfortunately, you find out that in this world no information comes free.

🍈 Information!

  • Melon Journey Pocket is a short prequel to Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories, which you can play now on Steam or GOG!
  • This game is created to run on Gameboy-compatible systems such as Sameboy, Analog Pocket and more! You will need to download Sameboy in order to play on your computer.

🍈 How to play:

  • Download Melon Journey Pocket
  • Download Sameboy for your preferred device
  • Open Melon Journey Pocket with Sameboy!

🍈 Languages

  • English
  • Japanese

💨Note for Steam & GOG enjoyers:

  • XSEED and Poppy Works are currently investigating how to best provide this game to players on the Steam and GOG platforms. If we can successfully do so, Melon Journey Pocket will be a free launch option alongside your Steam or GOG purchase of Melon Journey: Bittersweet Memories.
